name: Fight With the Devil
description:
A game i made during the 150# 1-week game jam, its theme was "you are the enemy". It is my first try on making a topdown rpg game with turn based fighting. To win , you need to analyses the fighter and not waste any of your turn. you need to plan strategically when to heal and when to attack and who to attack. to prevent players from abusing the heal button.iam not planning to continue the game.
